import { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import { Dialog, Disclosure, Popover, Transition } from "@headlessui/react"; import { XMarkIcon, Bars3Icon, SquaresPlusIcon, CursorArrowRaysIcon, } from "@heroicons/react/24/outline"; import { PhoneIcon, PlayCircleIcon, ChevronDownIcon, } from "@heroicons/react/20/solid"; import LoginPopup from "../Components/LoginModal/Modal"; import { useRecoilState } from "recoil"; import { authState } from "../State/auth"; const products = [ { name: "Shopping", description: "A List of products offered by RV Enterprises", href: "/products", icon: SquaresPlusIcon, }, { name: "FOREX TRADING", description: "Get an insight about RV enterprises Forex Trading", href: "/", icon: CursorArrowRaysIcon, }, ]; function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(" "); } export default function Header() { const authStateData = useRecoilState(authState); const [mobileMenuOpen, setMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false); return (
  • RESOURCES & DOWNLOADS
  • Join Us
  • About Us
  • RV Newsletter
RV ENterprises
Future Plans
{products.map((item) => (
{item.name}

{item.description}

))}

{authStateData.isLoggedIn ? "User" : "Log In"}

{({ open }) => ( <> Future Plans {products.map((item) => ( {item.name} ))} )} About Us Contact Us Company Plans Future Plans Join Us

); }
